banner.title: 申请
text: 撰写项目申请书提出申请。

banner.title: 项目
text: 学生在社区导师的指导下开展项目，

banner.title: 奖励
text: 代码贡献等提供奖金、证书。

ls.title: 学生
ls.text: 学生自由选择项目，与社区导师沟通实现方案并撰写项目计划书。被选中的学生将在社区导师指导下，按计划完成开发工作，并将成果贡献给社区。社区评估学生的完成度，主办方根据评估结果给学生发放奖金。

ls.title: 社区
ls.text: 社区提供项目列表和描述，并安排项目对应的导师，导师与申请者沟通方案、并从申请者中选中一位承接项目。在为期三个月的开发周期中，导师指导学生进行对应项目的开发工作。

ls.title: 导师
ls.text: 社区针对每一个项目指定一个社区导师，与学生一起制定合适的开发计划和方案，指导学生按计划完成开发。

time.title: 第一批社区名单公示，学生开始与社区沟通项目意向
社区报名、项目提交截止
学生提交项目申请阶段
导师审核学生申请材料阶段
项目申请审核结果公示
项目研发第一阶段（08月15日24点为中期研发成果提交截止日期）
项目中期考核结果公示
项目研发第二阶段（09月30日24点为结项研发成果提交截止日期）
项目结项考核结果公示

committee.name: 武延军

committee.university: 中国科学院计算技术研究所
committee.name: 包云岗

committee.university: 中科软科技股份有限公司
committee.name: 张正

banner.title: Application
text: students are free to choose projects

banner.title: Project
text: students conduct the project under the guidance of the community mentor and contribute the code to the community.

banner.title: Reward
text: Certificate and award is provided according to students' contribution.

ls.title: Students
ls.text: Students are free to choose projects and communicate with mentors on implementation plans in order to write project plans. The selected students will complete the development task as planned and contribute the results to the community under the guidance of the community mentor. The community evaluates student completion and the organizer committee grants the money award to students based on the evaluation results.

ls.title: Community
ls.text: The community provides a list and description of the project, and arranges for a mentor to communicate the program with the applicant and select one of the applicants to undertake the project. During the three-month development period, the mentor guides the students in developing the corresponding projects.

ls.title: Mentor
ls.text: For each project, the community assigns a mentor to work with the students to develop appropriate plan and guide the students to complete the task as planned.

time.title: Open of application for open source community
Announcement of the first list of accepted open source community
Deadline of application and project release for open source community
Announcement of the second list of accepted open source community
